(Yes DarkMouse is still talking to Inferno)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Sorry I didn't post yesterday, I was at my cousin's wedding. There 
> was over 200 messages to read, and only one had something to do 
with 
> my chars, and that was only Drillbit asking Starscream how long to 
> go. And somebody said that there was a rule against building bases 
or 
> something, but when I built the embassy nobody complained. And Koj, 
I 
> know that you got rid of the chip, but my character Prebon doesn't. 
> He's not done with you yet. Oh No. Not by a long shot. And 
Soulstice 
> is right about KSL. All you do is complain if somebody does a 
little 
> thing wrong. Half of your posts are telling somebody that they 
broke 
> the littlest of rules. You don't see any of the other moderators 
> going after the rules like that. Too me it seems you find joy in 
> taking the fun out of other people's post. So why don't you just 
keep 
> your mouth shut and concentrate on your own stuff.)
> 
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois saw the look of joy come up on Battera's face, and than die 
> down. She must have been thinking something would go wrong. He felt 
> like that to, and he felt like he could not leave the Alliance for 
> some reason. He also thought that the farther they pursued this, 
the 
> stronger those feelings would be. But they had to try.
> 
> "Would their be anyway we could extract the information from me?"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream answered Drillbit.
> 
> "I don't know. I have to find him first." Just than his radar 
started 
> beeping, and Inferno came on the screen.
> 
> "Got him! Follow me!"
> 
> Starscream took off.
> 
> (Is Inferno still talking with Darkmouse?)
